episodes.title: 5 years in a cult…
episodes.description:
This episode of ‘MLM Horror Stories’ follows Andi and Dave in their life-changing journey through the pyramid scheme Amway, and its sister company, Worldwide Dreambuilders. But it wasn’t “life-changing” in the way they were promised…

Second Channel:

Music Channel:

episodes.title: Escaped After 7 Years in a Pyramid Scheme?? || MLM Horror Stories
episodes.description:
Meet Daniel, who spent seven years immersed in a multi level marketin company. In this video, we explore his journey through those years in an MLM company (which he’s chosen to keep anonymous). Discover how the experience impacted his marriage, parenting, and livelihood, and learn the surprising answer to a pressing question: How did he manage to maintain good terms with his mentors after all this time?

Daniel Awosanya

episodes.title: I Interviewed My Downline from Amway || MLM Horror Stories
episodes.description:
Sorry for the brief haitus everyone!! The holidays compounded with some recent analysis paralysis about splitting my main channel into 3 separate channels, and it led to much procrastination. Thanks for your patience everyone!

In Today’s video, I’m interviewing Tanner, who was my direct downline in Amway before we got out. Little did I know, he knew the organization was a cult long before he ever chose to join…

episodes.title: Inside Info From an Amway Coach || MLM Horror Stories
episodes.description:
In this episode of MLM Horror Stories, I had the pleasure of interviewing Amber—the woman who was my coach and upline in the pyramid scheme known as Amway—and it’s sister company—Worldwide Dreambuilders (WWG.) 

In this interview, Amber reveals the cold truth behind what really goes on near the top of the pyramid, and tells us about her own chilling experience as a coach for Amway and WWG. 

SUBSCRIBE TO AMBER ON YOUTUBE:

episodes.title: Reading The Letters My Upline Shredded
episodes.description:
Hey guys! In my last anti-MLM video I spoke about the letters I wrote to all of my Amway friends before I quit, and how most of them were never opened due to my upline instructing them to be shredded. Little did they know, I had them all saved on a Google doc… let’s finally find out what they said! 

If you didn’t catch my last anti MLM video, definitely go check that out! I shared my entire MLM experience, start to finish, and I think you really enjoy it! ⬇️

The Truth About Amway and Worldwide Dreambuilders…. (MLM Horror Stories)
https://youtu.be/ptYc5i5OCnY

My apologies for all the jump cuts. I’m still getting the hang of being a YouTuber and  I definitely overdid it a little! 😬

If you enjoy my content, feel free to subscribe and leave a comment!

episodes.title: Rewatching My Amway “Pep-Talk” Videos
episodes.description:
Back in Amway my “mentors” would always make us record these self-motivating videos after motivational events…SO EMBARRASSING. Let’s re-Watch them together.
